title: Ukraineâ€™s Army Advances Toward Kherson, as Mud Season Arrives
description: Fall rains have turned the earth to sludge, slowing advances at least until the winter freeze, in conditions that have hampered military movement for centuries.
dc:creator: Marc Santora
media:credit: Ivor Prickett for The New York Times
media:description: A Ukrainian soldier passing the window of a school that was used as a base by Russian forces in Velyka Oleksandrivka, in the Kherson region of Ukraine.
